articles.summary: Barchart: This Dividend Giant Yielding 4.5% Is Wall Street’s Top Telecom Pick for 2026. JPMorgan just released a list of its 47 top stock picks for 2026, but only one comes from the telecom industry, a stock that features an attractive yield and improving cash flow outlook. Related tickers mentioned: T.
